title: Last Christmas
description: Last Christmas, I had everything I’d ever dreamed of.The perfect place, the perfect gift and the perfect girl.And now it’s all gone. It’s lost in a sea of broken promises,lies, cheating, and torn hearts. Christmas won’t be the samewithout you and I’m damned if I’ll let myself wallow. All I want for Christmas...is you.A Novella from Ollie's POV. DO NOT READ IF YOU HAVE NOT FINISHED BOUND TOGETHER.
author: Marie Coulson
